sql.name: INSERT_BOOKGRADE_SQL
sql.query: INSERT INTO BOOKGRADE(book_id, user_id, grade) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

sql.name: LIST_BOOKGRADE_SQL
sql.query: SELECT U.id as uid ,U.user_id as user_id ,U.nickname as user_nickname ,BG.grade as grade ,BG.id as id FROM USER U, BOOKGRADE BG WHERE BG.book_id=? AND BG.user_id=U.id AND U.delete_y_n=0 LIMIT ?,?

sql.name: LIST_MYBOOKGRADE_SQL
sql.query: SELECT BG.grade as grade ,BG.id as id ,B.name as book_name ,B.isbn10 as isbn FROM BOOK B, USER U, BOOKGRADE BG WHERE BG.user_id = ? AND BG.user_id=U.id AND BG.book_id=B.id AND U.delete_y_n=0 LIMIT ?,?
